en.subHeading: Discover beautiful, meaningful names for your little miracle. Generate, explore, and save your favorites.
en.discoverSubtitle: Generate beautiful, meaningful names for your little one
en.whyLoveSubtitle: More than just a name list - we help you find names with meaning, style, and perfect fit for your family.
en.featureMeaningfulText: Every name comes with its origin, meaning, and cultural significance to help you choose wisely.
en.featureSharingText: Share your favorite names with family and friends, get opinions, and make decisions together.
en.featurePersonalizedText: Filter by gender, origin, popularity, and style preferences to find names that resonate with you.
en.footerCopyright: ¬© 2025 Baby Names Generator. All rights reserved.
en.noNamesFound: No names found for this filter combination.
en.shareNameText: How about this name for the baby? %name% - "%meaning%". Found it on the Perfect Baby Names website!
en.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear your entire list of favorite names?
en.quizGenderTitle: First, who is the name for?
en.quizSuggestionsTitle: Based on your style, here are 5 suggestions:
en.q1_question: When you think of a name, you lean towards:
en.q1_opt1: Something familiar and respected for generations.
en.q2_opt1: The story and meaning behind the name.
en.q2_opt2: How it sounds and flows with the last name.
en.q4_question: Which name length do you prefer?
en.q4_opt1: Short and sweet, easy to pronounce.
en.q4_opt2: Longer and more elegant, with nickname potential.
en.q5_question: Your ideal name would come from:
en.q5_opt1: A unique, creative or modern inspiration.
en.q5_opt2: The beauty of the natural world.
en.style_classic_desc: You appreciate names that have stood the test of time. You're drawn to elegant, traditional, and noble names that carry history and grace.
en.style_modern_desc: You're a trendsetter! You love names that are creative, rare, and feel fresh. You're not afraid to choose a name that stands out from the crowd.
en.style_nature_desc: You find beauty in the natural world. Names like River, Willow, or Forrest appeal to you, reflecting a love for the earth and all things organic.
en.style_romantic_desc: For you, a name must have a soul. You're drawn to poetic, beautiful names with deep meanings, perhaps from mythology, literature, or art.
en.listCopiedToast: List copied to clipboard! You can now paste it wherever you want.
en.coupleModeIntroDesc: Start a session and share the code with your partner. Like names separately, and we'll show you the ones you both love!
en.createSessionDesc: Share this code with your partner. When they join, you can start liking names to find your matches!
en.invalidCodeError: Invalid or expired code. Please try again.
en.coupleModeTip: Tip: For better matches, try using the same Gender, Culture, and Religion filters!
en.aboutContent:
Welcome to Perfect Baby Names! We are passionate about helping expecting parents find the perfect name for their little miracle.

Our journey began when we were expecting our first child and felt overwhelmed by the thousands of names available. We wanted a simple, beautiful, and fun tool to discover names, learn their meanings, and share our favorites. That's how this site was born.

Our mission is to make your naming journey a joyful and memorable experience. Thank you for letting us be a small part of your big adventure!
en.contactContent:
We'd love to hear from you!

Whether you have a question, a suggestion for a new feature, or just want to share your story, feel free to reach out.

Email us at: [your-contact-email@example.com]
en.privacyContent:
Last updated: September 17, 2025 Welcome to our site. Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy explains how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit our website.

1. Information We Collect

When you visit the site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device. Additionally, we use cookies to store your preferences, such as your favorite names list and language choice.

2. Use of Your Information

We use the information we collect to: - Operate and maintain our website. - Improve, personalize, and expand our website. - Understand and analyze how you use our website via analytics tools. - Serve personalized advertisements through third-party partners like Google AdSense.

3. Third-Party Access to Information

- **Google AdSense:** We use Google AdSense to display ads. Google uses cookies to serve ads based on a user's prior visits to our website or other websites. Google's use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads to our users based on their visit. You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google's Ad Settings. - **Firebase:** The 'Couple Mode' feature uses Google Firebase to temporarily store session data (liked names) in real-time. This data is anonymous and tied only to a random session code.

4. Your Rights & Opt-Out

You have the right to control the use of your data. A compliant cookie consent banner is provided to manage your preferences for non-essential cookies. You can also configure your browser settings to refuse cookies.

5. Site Owner

This website is owned and operated by: [Your Name or Company Name] [Your City/Country] If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.
